name: Tiny Smol Bby Game
description:
Tiny Smol Bby Game is a 2D puzzle game about fixing satellites all over a city. Turning one on will send out a signal to other satellites near it, flipping them on or off! The player controls Mr. Tiny Smol, who must turn on all satellites in order to progress.

The game was made as a part of a small team over the course of 5 days in the Unity Engine. We were tasked as a class to create a game with the theme of transmission in a sort of game jam-esque competition and Tiny Smol Bby Game won!

I was responsible for the gameplay programming and level design of the game.
